description: Established musicians advancing their careers often assume leadership positions where they lead and manage teams of people. These could be made up of musicians with minimal administrative background or administrative teams with little musical understanding. This module aims to provide musicians with a solid understanding of leadership strategies building out of their transferable musical skills, to help them navigate both environments effectively as a leader.
title: Leadership in Musical Contexts
prerequisite: This module is restricted to students enrolled in the Master of Music Leadership degree programme.
